== Description ==
Check whether serialized data is of string type. 

== Usage ==
%%%<?php is_serialized_string( $data ) ?>%%%

== Parameters ==
{{Parameter|$data|mixed|Serialized data}}

== Return Values ==
; (boolean) : False if not a serialized string, true if it is.

== Examples ==
<!-- Need creative examples. Feel free to link to external examples. -->

== Notes ==
* Data might need to be <i>serialized</i> to allow it to be successfully stored and retrieved from a database in a form that PHP can understand.

== Change Log ==
Since: 2.0.5

== Source File ==
<tt>is_serialized_string()</tt> is located in {{Trac|wp-includes/functions.php}}.
